column4: I have 3CRWE154G72 wifi card, it works in kernel 2.6.15-19 but it does NOT work in the new kernels 2.6.15-21 to 23   What can I do to connect wirelessly again?
what chipset is it based off of?
maybe they didn't load a module
i've got issues with my ndiswrapper
I didn't need ndiswrappper, it worked perfectly without it
but not in the lask kernels
you either don't have a module loaded, or your card isn't prism
i'm going to guess you have a module not loaded, or a bad config
find out what driver you need
how do you load a driver in Ubuntu?
